column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Each time I've been
column2: I've been with my handsome and his brother. So I have some Ramen pictures that weren't of my dish. (Sorry
column3: I know they won't help without captions
column4: but maybe the pics will ignite a hankering for Jinya.) We did however all dig into the crispy chicken (pictured). Good but not my ideal app. However
column5: the guys always want this and I'm up for whatever when I'm in good company.
